subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pedro Martínez retired the first nine batters he faced Tuesday against the Dodgers’ Gulf Coast League team. But in the fourth inning, he threw 29 pitches and allowed a three-run homer.
snippet: Pedro Martínez retired the first nine batters he faced Tuesday against the Dodgers’ Gulf Coast League team. But in the fourth inning, he threw 29 pitches and allowed a three-run homer.
